item.title: Good Smile Company Launches HELLO! GOOD SMILE Line and Exclusives at New York Comic Con 2021
item.dc:creator: nate
item.description:
The amazing Good Smile Company is celebrating their 20th anniversary! With New York Comic Con marking its return to live events at the Javtis Center, Good Smile Company is set to launch their new figure line titled, “HELLO! GOOD SMILE”! New York Comic Con Booth So come stop by and say hello to Good Smile …

The post Good Smile Company Launches HELLO! GOOD SMILE Line and Exclusives at New York Comic Con 2021 appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
The amazing Good Smile Company is celebrating their 20th anniversary! With New York Comic Con marking its return to live events at the Javtis Center, Good Smile Company is set to launch their new figure line titled, “HELLO! GOOD SMILE”!

New York Comic Con Booth

So come stop by and say hello to Good Smile Company at their booth, #1419! You’ll be able to preview the latest Nendoroid, POP UP PARADE, and figma sculpts. This is a must-see for anyone interested in collecting figures of all shapes, sizes, and types of various characters from their favorite anime and video games.

HELLO! GOOD SMILE: Hatsune Miku

And for the Vocaloid enthusiasts like ourselves, we’re happy to say the adorable Hatsune Miku is going to be released as a part of the HELLO! GOOD SMILE line in a special ice cream-themed display! You’ll also get the opportunity to take home a special HELLO! GOOD SMILE themed keychain.

NYCC 2021 Exclusive

Additionally, Good Smile Company will have a limited quantity of special Naruto Nendoroid Pin (Black & White Version) available for purchase!

Other character goods from series such as Cardcaptor Sakura, Jojo’s Bizarre Adventure, and My Hero Academia are also going to be available, alongside merchandise from For Fans By Fans. Make sure to take a look while supplies last!

This year, New York Comic Con will run from October 7-10, 2021, at the Jarvis Center.
For tickets, check out https://www.newyorkcomiccon.com/ !

Good Smile Company Links

Instagram

Twitter

Facebook

Youtube

The post Good Smile Company Launches HELLO! GOOD SMILE Line and Exclusives at New York Comic Con 2021 appeared first on VNN.

item.title: New Hatsune Miku V4X Nendoroid Announced
item.dc:creator: Momoi
item.description:
Good Smile Co. just revealed Hatsune Miku’s latest nendoroid! While her V4X design inspired both a figma and 1/7 scale statue, she now has a nendoroid on the way! The articulated chibi collectible is currently available to pre-order. Features and Details According to Good Smile Company, the Hatsune Miku V4X nendoroid will have lots of …

The post New Hatsune Miku V4X Nendoroid Announced appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Good Smile Co. just revealed Hatsune Miku’s latest nendoroid! While her V4X design inspired both a figma and 1/7 scale statue, she now has a nendoroid on the way! The articulated chibi collectible is currently available to pre-order.

Features and Details

According to Good Smile Company, the Hatsune Miku V4X nendoroid will have lots of unique assets! For one thing, the figure stands out with the distinct, angular shape of her twin tails. Where other versions of Miku have her hair in one long, smooth and soft-looking piece each, this version highlights the “sharper”, more dynamic ends that iXima used for her V4 update.

Not only that, but the translucent socks and sleeves are an added detail, along with her hair pieces that are solid pink rather than the black diamonds with the pink light in the center.

Aside from the initial unique details, the figure will come with lots of additional pieces!

For example, Good Smile reported that the figure will have three face plates/expressions. She will have: “A standard expression, a smiling expression, and a starry-eyed expression filled with curiosity”.

In addition, this nendoroid includes two optional parts; a guitar and a pair of glasses! Several extra hand pieces with different poses will be included, which will allow for maximum pose-ability for Miku’s newest figure!

Pre-order and Release

As of now, the Hatsune Miku V4X nendoroid is available for pre-order via the Good Smile Japanese website for 5,500 JPY.

It is also available on the Good Smile US store for 52.99 USD, and Tokyo Otaku Mode for 55.99 USD.

There is no set release date beyond October 2020, however a more specific date will be nailed down in the future.

We’ll keep you posted here, so be sure to check back for the latest updates!

Sources

Good Smile official announcement
Hatsune Miku is on Facebook (English and Japanese), Twitter (English and Japanese), YouTube and Weibo

The post New Hatsune Miku V4X Nendoroid Announced appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Wonder Festival 2019 in Shanghai Figures Round-up!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
Wonder Festival 2019 in Shanghai brought up many new figures for virtual singer’s fan to enjoy! Let’s check them out together with our round-up! An Event Filled With Surprises Good Smile Company’s Wonder Festival is surely one of the events that most collectors look forward to, especially because there are a lot of figures showing …

The post Wonder Festival 2019 in Shanghai Figures Round-up! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Wonder Festival 2019 in Shanghai brought up many new figures for virtual singer’s fan to enjoy! Let’s check them out together with our round-up!

An Event Filled With Surprises

Good Smile Company’s Wonder Festival is surely one of the events that most collectors look forward to, especially because there are a lot of figures showing up. Most of them are Hatsune Miku ones from many different manufacturers, but you can usually spot some of the other characters we love as well!

Let’s have a look together!

1/7 Scale Figure Hatsune Miku Memorial Dress Ver.

Probably one of the highlights of this event was Hatsune Miku’s Memorial Dress figure. This was the very first time the full painted version had been showed in public and it’s absolutely gorgeous!

Source: GoodSmile Shanghai on Weibo

This marvelous scale figure still has no release date yet, but considering how glorious this item is, we might as well wait for a little while! Here is also a video made by Amico from AmiAmi, showing her figure in even more different prospective!

グッドスマイルカンパニーさまのミクさんキュートさのボリュームがすごいデス#あみこの出張記 #上海ワンフェス #wf2019上海 #ワンフェス上海 #wf上海 pic.twitter.com/5dbdkXoW4K

— あみこ＠上海WF (@amicoamiami) June 8, 2019

Awesome isn’t it? Can’t wait for more updates as well!

1/8 Scale Figure Hatsune Miku “The First Dream” Ver.

You should be able to recognize this album: yes, it’s Hatsune Miku’s “The First Dream” album from our partners Mikai Music! Seems this version of our beloved diva stole the fan’s heart enough to get an adorable 1/8 scale figure from Max Factory!

Source: GoodSmile Shanghai on Weibo

Chieri made an awesome job as sculptor of this figure, and we cannot wait to hear more about it!

Hatsune Miku V4 CHINESE Figma

Another marvelous new item from Max Factory is Hatsune Miku V4C’s figma! Faithfully reproducing Mame No Moto‘s design, this figma will make an awesome addition to your personal Miku collection!

More from Aquamarine!

アクアマリンさまの新作パネル#あみこ出張記#上海ワンフェス #wf2019上海 #ワンフェス上海 #wf上海 pic.twitter.com/C8E9kGnl4F

— あみこ＠上海WF (@amicoamiami) June 8, 2019

Of course Aquamarine joined this party this time around as well, and from what we could see from their new items wall, Racing Miku 2013 and 2019 were there as well!

While Racing Miku 2013 Round 4 SUGO’s figure wasn’t exactly a new announcement, Racing Miku 2019 Thailand was surely a well welcomed reveal for this event! Stay tuned with us for more updates on those products!

1/8 Scale Figure Luo Tianyi Lemon Ver.

It’s time for a small break from Miku figures ladies and gentlemen, but this doesn’t mean this next figure is less awaited than the previous ones: say hello to Luo Tianyi Lemon version’s 1/8 scale figure, now entirely painted for our eyes to enjoy!

Source: GoodSmileArts on Weibo

This figure, based off of Luo Tianyi’s illustration drawn by TID, has been around as prototype for a while, but we never got the chance to see it fully colored!

Her release is scheduled for May 2020.

22 & 33 Pure White Love Ver. Bilibili 10th Anniversary Commemorative Figures

Next we have Bilibili’s very own virtual idols 22 and 33. Each of them will get a marvelous figure from Good Smile Company as commemoration of the platform’s 10th anniversary!

Marvelously recreated from Rella’s artwork, those figures are 1/7 scale each and will be available for pre-order on June 26th, with a release date on 2020 Q3.

With them being an anniversary commemorative pair of figures, they are of course only available in limited quantity. In fact, they will only produce 9002 units for them, with a price of 1688 CNY.

You can find them on Bilibili’s official shop by clicking here.

You may need help to get them shipped outside China!

To Be Continued…

The first day of Wonder Festival 2019 in Shanghai is now over, but it will keep going tomorrow as well! There is an high chance of more figures being revealed so stay tuned with us and keep an eye on this article: we will keep updating it of course!

Wonder Festival 2019 in Shanghai details can be found here and here.
We also suggest you keep an eye on Kahotan and Hama‘s Twitter accounts for more news!

The post Wonder Festival 2019 in Shanghai Figures Round-up! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Snow Miku 2020 Design Finalists Announced, Voting Website Launched & Livestream Summary
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
Good Smile Company’s “Snow Miku Time” livestream event has finished, and has a lot of exciting news to share! If you missed the live stream event, you can rewatch the YouTube recording for as long as it’s available. Let’s get started on the announcements! Even though it was the last part of the live stream, the reveal …

The post Snow Miku 2020 Design Finalists Announced, Voting Website Launched & Livestream Summary appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Good Smile Company’s “Snow Miku Time” livestream event has finished, and has a lot of exciting news to share! If you missed the live stream event, you can rewatch the YouTube recording for as long as it’s available. Let’s get started on the announcements!

Even though it was the last part of the live stream, the reveal of the Snow Miku and Yukine 2020 design finalists is what everyone was waiting for! Here’s the list of the 6 finalists:

#1: “Grand Piano” by 杏夏蜜柑 → https://piapro.jp/t/saxQ
#2: “Taiko” by こり → https://piapro.jp/t/YxrR
#3: “Horn” by メープル → https://piapro.jp/t/HnGM
#4: “Accordion” by mgr → https://piapro.jp/t/sWBP
#5: “Flute” by 二六時中 → https://piapro.jp/t/lO2m
#6: “Marching Band” by ππ → https://piapro.jp/t/P9Kf

Community voting will be counted until May 17th, JST. Only one vote per person/device will be counted! The winning design will be announced at Magical Mirai 2019.

-> CLICK HERE TO VOTE! <-
Magical Mirai 2019

A new piece of artwork showing off Magical Mirai 2019 themed outfits for Kagamine Rin & Len, Megurine Luka, KAITO and MEIKO were revealed during the livestream. Expect these designs to play part in decorations and goods for Magical Mirai 2019!

The Nendoroid Hatsune Miku: Magical Mirai 2018 ver. was also announced during the stream! Details regarding pricing and release date were not yet announced, but we can expect to hear more soon.

Racing Miku 2019

Good Smile Company announced a 1/8 scale figure for Racing Miku 2018, based on the art design by Annin Oiko! There’s only a prototype sculpture being teased for now. Expect a painted version to be revealed, along with pricing and release info at a later date.

Good Smile Racing and Nitroplus are collaborating together again this year with Racing Miku and Super Sonico. Two new artworks by Minoa and 津路参汰 were released as part of this collaboration. Other details of the collaboration will come at a later time.

Other Goods & Collabs

A scale figure of Hatsune Miku Symphony 2018~2019 will be made! The figure will be based on the original artwork by Rella. Other details are not yet available, so keep watching for that.

Also, a Hatsune Miku x Macaron collaboration was announced, which will make special Cryptonloid themed Macaroons available, along with an A2 size visual poster!

Lastly, SEGA announced the availability and release dates for the following prize plushies and figures: Hatsune Miku: White Dress ver. plushie (releases 3rd week of May 2019), Hatsune Miku: White Dress ver. premium figure (releases 4th week of May 2019), a new trio of Hatsune Miku keychain plushies (releases 3rd week of June 2019) and Mega Jumbo Fuwafuwa ver. Sakura Miku plushie (on preorder at Chara-Ani until May 28th).

Source: Mikufan.com

The post Snow Miku 2020 Design Finalists Announced, Voting Website Launched & Livestream Summary appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Winter WonFes 2018 VOCALOID Figure Roundup!
item.dc:creator: Hoshi
item.description:
It’s that time of the year again! Figure manufacturers and garage kit makers flocked to Japan to show off their newest works. In addition, big companies also made lots of announcements about what they plan to make in the future! While the VOCALOID pickings weren’t amazing, they also weren’t slim, either. New Announcements Click the …

The post Winter WonFes 2018 VOCALOID Figure Roundup! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
It’s that time of the year again! Figure manufacturers and garage kit makers flocked to Japan to show off their newest works. In addition, big companies also made lots of announcements about what they plan to make in the future! While the VOCALOID pickings weren’t amazing, they also weren’t slim, either.

New Announcements

Click the figure names for sources!

Hatsune Miku V4 Chinese Scale

1/7 Scale Racing Miku 2018 Ver.

Racing Miku 2017 SPA Support Ver.
1/8 Scale Racing Miku 2017 Thailand Ver.

1/7 Scale Kagamine Rin Stylish Energy R Ver. (Prototype picture source)
1/7 Scale Kagamine Len Stylish Energy L Ver. (Prototype picture source)
Black ★ Rock Shooter inexhaustible Ver. Scale
1/43 Scale GSR AMG 2017 Series Winning Ver.
 

Previously Announced With Updates

These figures were previously announced but have since received either a prototype or a painted prototype.

1/7 Scale Hatsune Miku Kuruwa Kotoba Awase Kagami Ver.

1/7 Scale Kasane Teto Yoshiwara Lament Ver. (More pictures here)

1/8 Scale Racing Miku 2016 Thailand Ver.

figma Miku V4X

Frame Music Girl Hatsune Miku

1/7 Scale Hatsune Miku: Wedding Dress Ver.


Prize Figures

SEGA showed off some upcoming prize figures!

Images from phaius66

Hatsune Miku Jer★Sey Ver.

Hatsune Miku Pieretta Ver.

Hatsune Miku Cabin Attendant Ver.

No Updates but Confirmed to be Still in Production

Unfortunately, not all figures are made quickly. However, there’s confirmation of many figures still being in production!

Still a Prototype

One Miku figure is suffering the treatment of being a prototype for quite some time. While it’s not uncommon, fans are still itching to see the finished product.


Image from phaius66

1/7 Scale Hatsune Miku: Vintage Dress ver.

Still on Production Plans

While these figures haven’t received prototypes yet, they’re still in the running to be figures!

キター！ pic.twitter.com/DuLi2IfcFw

— イットリウムはMIKU9000の一部 (@an39th) February 18, 2018

1/8 Scale “Rin Chan Now!” Adult Rin Ver.

Scale Racing Luka 2017 Ver.

Scale Hatsune Miku: Symphony 2017 Ver.

Nowhere to Be Seen

KAITOが1/4スケール化！
1/4ったらあれですよ、すっごく大きいやつです。 pic.twitter.com/v3VEfhUWte

— オーノシ@グッスマ (@gsc_ohno) February 19, 2017

And on the day after his birthday (WonFes was the 18th in Japan), KAITO was nowhere to be seen. While a 1/4 scale figure of his V3 design was previously announced, his announcement was removed from the production wall. In addition, no pictures of a prototype surfaced online. While it’s unsure if he’s been cancelled, KAITO fans are definitely worried. Stay tuned to VNN as we investigate the Disappearance of 1/4 Scale KAITO.

Ready for Pre-Order

And finally, there’s one item already available for pre-order that was featured at WonFes!

バンダイブース
Figure-rise Bust
初音ミク [リミテッドカラー]（本日分完売）#wf2018w#whl4u pic.twitter.com/TwJARanhkg

— クーちゃろけ@超ボーマス1日目E38 (@phaius66) February 18, 2018

This limited metallic colored version of the Figure-rise Bust Vocaloid Hatsune Miku sold out during WonFes! You can pre-order her at Tokyo Otaku Mode, though!

TOM at Winter WonFes 2018 Sale

In addition you can check out the Tokyo Otaku Mode at Winter WonFes 2018 sale here. They have select figures up to 20% off PLUS up to 20x TOM points on figure pre-orders for Premium Members. Your first three months of Premium are only $4.99 USD as well!

Deals end Feb. 19, 2018, 11:59pm (PST)

As always, stay tuned to VNN for when the figures are released!

The post Winter WonFes 2018 VOCALOID Figure Roundup! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Crypton VOCALOID Nendoroids Re-released on Tokyo Otaku Mode!
item.dc:creator: Hoshi
item.description:
It looks like Good Smile Company isn’t the only one going retro this weekend. While they have some pretty old VOCALOID Nendoroids of their own at their Anime Expo Booth, Tokyo Otaku Mode is throwing some seriously awesome re-releases our way as well! Unfortunately, Miku and Luka have already sold out, and it seems MEIKO …

The post Crypton VOCALOID Nendoroids Re-released on Tokyo Otaku Mode! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
It looks like Good Smile Company isn’t the only one going retro this weekend. While they have some pretty old VOCALOID Nendoroids of their own at their Anime Expo Booth, Tokyo Otaku Mode is throwing some seriously awesome re-releases our way as well! Unfortunately, Miku and Luka have already sold out, and it seems MEIKO isn’t as lucky as the others. But if you’re looking for Rin, Len, or KAITO, here’s your chance! In addition, all Crypton VOCALOID Nendoroids have free shipping for first time customers!

Nendoroid Kagamine Rin

Price: $27.89 USD

Purchase Here

Nendoroid Kagamine Len

Price: $27.89 USD

Purchase Here

Nendoroid KAITO

Price: $27.89 USD

Purchase Here

Other Crypton Goodies

While these aren’t as shiny and have been in the TOM shop for a while, you still may want to add them to your order!

Fans of MEIKO can get their fix with the figma MEIKO currently available for pre-order. She also comes with free shipping for first time customers and costs $61.99 USD.

If you want ALL the new V3 and V4 Crypton designs in figure form, check out the Hatsune Miku Renewal Nendoroid Petit series.

And you can check out all of the VOCALOID goodies available at TOM here. They have everything from the Cryptonloids, Stardust, Zunko, IA and so much more! There’s a little something to suit every VOCALOID fan.

The post Crypton VOCALOID Nendoroids Re-released on Tokyo Otaku Mode! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: VOCALOID Merch at Anime Expo!
item.dc:creator: Hoshi
item.description:
Anime Expo is this weekend! And, of course, no AX attendee who loves VOCALOID wants to go home without any merch! Luckily, there’s a ton of VOCALOID Merch at Anime Expo! There’s Miku and IA galore, as well as some older figures from Good Smile Company! Hatsune Miku Merch With Miku’s big 10th anniversary right …

The post VOCALOID Merch at Anime Expo! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Anime Expo is this weekend! And, of course, no AX attendee who loves VOCALOID wants to go home without any merch! Luckily, there’s a ton of VOCALOID Merch at Anime Expo! There’s Miku and IA galore, as well as some older figures from Good Smile Company!

Hatsune Miku Merch

With Miku’s big 10th anniversary right around the corner, it’s only natural to expect some Miku goodies. You’ll want to check out Booth #1930 for some Miku 10th anniversary merch as well as some 2016 tour goods and more! And there are free stickers with every purchase! Here are the announced items:

10th Anniversary Goods

  • T-Shirt featuring the illustration by KEI ($30)
  • Wall Scroll featuring the same illustration ($30)
  • Keychain ($10)
  • SONOCA Presents: HATSUNE MIKU EP 2017

Miku Expo 2016 Merch

  • Hatsune Miku Expo 2016 EP ($15)
  • Sunglasses ($5)
  • Snapback ($5)
  • Tote Bag ($5)
  • Blind Back Pack ($60) [Includes: 1 Backpack, 1 Sweatshirt, 1 T-shirt, 1 Hat, 1 Wristband, 1 Sticker Sheet, 1 Pouch, and 1 Keychain]
  • Blind Poster Tube ($15) [Includes 2 Posters]

If you’d like to see higher quality images of the Miku Expo 2016 merch, check out the official goods website here. If you see something not listed for sale at AX (or if you’re not going to AX), the website is accepting purchases!

Squishable

  • 15″ Squishable ($45)
  • Micro Squishable ($10)

Gallery Nucleus Art Catalog

While not mentioned in the sales menu, art catalogs from the Miku Gallery Nucleus art exhibition will also be available! It’s online price is $25 so expect it to cost somewhere in that range.

HachiojiP and BIGHEAD Goods

These are also available at the Miku booth (Booth #1930)

The first 100 purchases of a HachiojiP or BIGHEAD album will receive a ticket to a free autograph session!

HachioujiP

  • Eight -THE BEST OF HachiojiP- Limited Edition ($45)
  • Eight -THE BEST OF HachiojiP- Standard Edition ($35)
  • T-Shirt White ($35)
  • T-Shirt Black ($35)
  • Towel ($25 Each) [Choice of Blue or Purple]
  • Silicone Wristband ($5 Each) [Choice of Red or Black]

BIGHEAD

  • “REWIND ’93” AX2017 Edition ($15) [Special Limited Edition Cassette Tape]
  • “RELOVE” feat. Hatsune Miku ($20)
  • “RELOVE” feat. Hatsune Miku T-Shirt ($40)
  • “ONLY 1” feat. Hatsune Miku ($20)
  • “ONLY 1” feat. Hatsune Miku T-Shirt ($40)
  • “01 FRIENDS” feat. Hatsune Miku ($15)
  • “01 FRIENDS” feat. Hatsune Miku T-Shirt ($40)
  • “01 FRIENDS” feat. Hatsune Miku Long Sleeve T-Shirt with Music DL Card ($75)

Good Smile Company

It seems like Good Smile raided their warehouses, because their AX lineup has some pretty old figures! If you’ve been trying to find some older VOCALOID figures brand new, here’s your chance! And, of course, they’re also carrying the newer must-have items as well. You can check them out at Booth #1600.

Tickets will be required to purchase from the booth. Tickets are limited in number so please be sure to stop by the booth (#1600) early to get a ticket! You can read the full ticketing information here.

  • Nendoroid Snow Miku: Twinkle Snow Ver. ($55)
  • figma Snow Miku: Twinkle Snow ver. ($60)
  • Nendoroid Jumbo Hatsune Miku ($150)
  • Nendoroid Snow Miku: Snow Owl Ver. ($50)
  • figma Snow Miku: Snow Owl ver. ($55)
  • Nendoroid Hatsune Miku: Harvest Moon Ver. ($45)
  • Nendoroid Hatsune Miku: Yukata Ver. Natsutsubaki ($35)
  • Nendoroid Sakura Miku: Bloomed in Japan ($40)
  • Nendoroid Hatsune Miku : Yukata Ver. ($30)
  • figma Hatsune Miku: Cheerful ver. ($35)
  • figma Snow Miku ($45)
  • figma Snow Miku: Snow Bell ver. ($55)
  • Nendoroid Petite: Hatsune Miku Renewal ($10 Each) [Blind Box Pull]
  • Nendoroid Co-de: Hatsune Miku – Ha2ne Miku Co-de ($30)
  • Nendoroid Black Rock Shooter : TV ANIMATION Ver. ($40)
  • Nendoroid Kagamine Len ($30)
  • Nendoroid Kagamine Rin: Append ($40)
  • Nendoroid Kagamine Len: Append ($40)
  • Nendoroid Racing Miku 2016 Ver. ($110)
  • figma Black Rock Shooter : TV ANIMATION ver. ($40)

IA and Kagerou Project Goods

Hello Los Angeles! Hello Anime Expo!Are you looking for IA official goods Anime Expo® Los Angeles this week-end?Visit…

Posted by IA　World Page on Wednesday, June 28, 2017

Visit JapanWave Booth #4909 and get your official IA and Kagerou Project goods!

VNN Goodies

Have you been eyeing up our con announcements showing off our sweet pins? Stay tuned to VNN for an announcement on how to grab some at AX! (Hint: You’ll have to find CowFee!)

Sources: Good Smile English Post 1, Good Smile English Post 2, Vocaloid Buy Blog

The post VOCALOID Merch at Anime Expo! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Megurine Luka: Temptation Ver. 1/7 Scale Now Available for Pre-order
item.dc:creator: Hoshi
item.description:
The long awaited Megurine Luka: Temptation Ver. 1/7 scale figure is now available for pre-order! Be sure to grab her while you can! “From SEGA’s popular rhythm game Hatsune Miku -Project DIVA- F 2nd comes a 1/7th scale figure of Megurine Luka wearing her Temptation module! The sexy outfit brings out her seductive charm, and …

The post Megurine Luka: Temptation Ver. 1/7 Scale Now Available for Pre-order appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
The long awaited Megurine Luka: Temptation Ver. 1/7 scale figure is now available for pre-order! Be sure to grab her while you can!

“From SEGA’s popular rhythm game Hatsune Miku -Project DIVA- F 2nd comes a 1/7th scale figure of Megurine Luka wearing her Temptation module! The sexy outfit brings out her seductive charm, and has been preserved in perfect detail by sculptor Grizzry Panda!

Luka’s impressive curves, the meticulous detail on her outfit, flow of her hair, and the way the finger inside her stocking stretches it out are just a few of the highlights the figure has to offer! She also comes with an interchangeable face part that allows you to display her without her mask. Be sure to add the charming Megurine Luka to your collection and enjoy her beauty by your side whenever you like!”

The scale figure’s suggested retail price is ¥13,800 JPY and she’s set to release in March 2018. Pre-orders on the Goodsmile Online Shop close on Thursday, August 10th, 2017, at 12:00 JST. In addition, Goodsmile Online Shop orders come with a special bonus!

Fans who pre-order Luka from the GSC shop can net themselves a special pair of exclusive bunny ears! While the bunny ears are surely tempting, they’re only available through the Goodsmile Online Shop.

About the Figure

In addition to the stunning sculpt and paint job which fans can see in the gallery pictures, the figure also has a special feature: Luka’s mask is removable!

Where to Purchase

CDJapan $102.68 USD

Goodsmile Online Shop ¥13,800 JPY (~$124 USD) [Pre-order Bonus Included]

AmiAmi ¥10,850 JPY (~$97 USD)

The post Megurine Luka: Temptation Ver. 1/7 Scale Now Available for Pre-order appeared first on VNN.

item.title: 1/4 Scale Megurine Luka V4X Figure Now Available for Pre-order!
item.dc:creator: Hoshi
item.description:
First teased ages ago at Summer WonFes 2015, the Megurine Luka V4X figure drew quite a bit of excitement when she debuted. And while we didn’t see a finished product until Winter WonFes 2017, fans can all agree it’s been well worth the wait. We finally have high quality pictures of the figure as well …

The post 1/4 Scale Megurine Luka V4X Figure Now Available for Pre-order! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
First teased ages ago at Summer WonFes 2015, the Megurine Luka V4X figure drew quite a bit of excitement when she debuted. And while we didn’t see a finished product until Winter WonFes 2017, fans can all agree it’s been well worth the wait. We finally have high quality pictures of the figure as well as opened pre-orders!

About the Figure

This 1/4 scale figure of Megurine Luka’s V4X design marks the second Crypton VOCALOID to receive one. Miku V3 started the line and then the figure was changed ever so slightly to make a Snow Miku 1/4 scale as well. According to Luka’s display at Winter WonFes 2017, KAITO V3 with his English bank pose will be next in the Crypton 1/4 scale series!

While the original pictures taken at WonFes had a slight purple tint, this was due to the cameras’ color balances being thrown off! We’re happy to say that the figure’s colors stay true to Luka’s V4X design.

Purchasing the Figure

Luka is available online for pre-order! Her suggested retail price is ¥25,741 JPY (about $230 USD), but some shops may have a cheaper or slightly higher price. GSC Online Shop pre-orders will be open from May 25th, 2017, from 12:00 JST until June 22nd, 2017, at 12:00 JST. However, these pre-orders may close early depending on demand. As always, if you want a figure, grab it while you can! She’s set to release in November. However, Tokyo Otaku Mode won’t ship her until February 2018.

Please note that these figures are BIG. Luka is approximately 410 mm in height! As such, shipping can be a bit pricey.

CDJapan: ¥23,167 JPY (about $207.50 USD)

Tokyo Otaku Mode: $283.99 USD (free priority shipping for first-time customers and free standard shipping for returning customers; only ships to the United States) [about $31.22 USDback in TOM points]

GoodSmile Online Shop: ¥25,741 JPY (about $230 USD)

AmiAmi: ¥21,890 JPY (about $196 USD)

The post 1/4 Scale Megurine Luka V4X Figure Now Available for Pre-order! appeared first on VNN.

The post Racing Miku 2017 Key Visual Revealed at Goodsmile Racing’s Year-end Party appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Racing Miku 2017 Ver. by Tony Taka

The Racing Miku 2017 key visual has been revealed today at Goodsmile Racing’s year-end party, and features a fantastic design by the talented artist Tony Taka! The wrapped machine featuring the design will be making her appearance on February 19th next year at Wonder Festival. Stay tuned!

About Tony Taka:

Tony Taka is an illustrator and character designer from Japan who debut in 1998, with over 130 of his characters been made into figures and total sales over 800,000. He’s also well-known for being the character designer of Sega’s RPG series “Shining” since 2004. Some may recognizes his style from the Hatsune Miku: Tony ver. figure which was released in March 2011.

Key visual is now on the official website! → http://www.goodsmileracing.com/en/

Fight, GSR!

Source: Mikufan.com

The post Racing Miku 2017 Key Visual Revealed at Goodsmile Racing’s Year-end Party appeared first on VNN.
